main

Class Routing

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Routing
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XYMesh, XYTorusFolded, XYTorusUnfolded, XYTorusUnfoldedOptimized

    public abstract class Routing
extends java.lang.Object
    Is the abstract base class for all the custom routing algorithms defined in the routing package. A custom routing algorithm that extends this abstract class must implement the initialize method in order to proper set the different router architectures.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Routing() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int calcInputPort(Topology top, int src, int dst)
      Calculates the input port used by a message to reach the current hop along the path between a source and a destination.
      abstract int calcOutputPort(Topology top, int src, int dst)
      Evaluates the output port ID required to reach the next hop.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Routing

        public Routing()

    • Method Detail

      • calcOutputPort

        public abstract int calcOutputPort(Topology top,
                 int src,
                 int dst)
        Evaluates the output port ID required to reach the next hop. It should be called in every hop along the path.
        Parameters:
        top - The topology
        src - The tile of the optical router
        dst - The destination tile
        Returns:
        The ID of the output port

      • calcInputPort

        public int calcInputPort(Topology top,
                int src,
                int dst)
        Calculates the input port used by a message to reach the current hop along the path between a source and a destination.
        Parameters:
        top - The topology
        src - The source tile of the optical router
        dst - The destination tile
        Returns:
        The input port
